ARABIC: وَإِذْ قُلْنَا لِلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسْجُدُوا۟ لِءَادَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓا۟ إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When We said to the angels, 'Prostrate yourselves to Adam!' they prostrated, with the exception of Iblis who disdained to do it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When We said to the angels: ''Bow before Adam,'' they all bowed but Iblis, who refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Recall when We said to the angels: "Prostrate yourselves before Adam"; all prostrated themselves save Iblis. He refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When We told the angels to prostrate before Adam they all obeyed except Iblis (satan) who refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when We commanded the angels, “Prostrate before Adam” – so they all prostrated, except Iblis; he refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And (remember) when We said to the angels: "Prostrate yourselves to Adam." They prostrated themselves (all) except Iblis; he refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when We said to the angels: Make obeisance to Adam, they made obeisance, but Iblis (did it not); he refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And when We said to the angels, 'Bow yourselves to Adam'; so they bowed themselves, save Iblis; he refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when We said unto the angels: Fall prostrate before Adam, they fell prostrate (all) save Iblis; he refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When We said to the angels, "Prostrate yourselves before Adam," they all prostrated themselves, except for Satan, who refused,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And recall what time We said to the angels: prostrate yourselves before Adam. They fell prostrate, but Iblis did not; he refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When We said to the angels, ‘Prostrate before Adam,’ they prostrated, but not Iblis: he refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: When We said to the angels, "Prostrate yourselves to Adam", they prostrated themselves, but not Iblis: he refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And (remember) when We said to the angels: "Prostrate yourselves to Adam." They prostrated (all) except Iblis (Satan), who refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And when We said to the angels: 'Prostrate yourselves before Adam' they all prostrated themselves except iblis, who refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And when We said to the angels, “Bow down to Adam.” They bowed down, except for Satan; he refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [mention] when We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except Iblees; he refused.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [20:116] And, mention, when We said to the angels, ‘Prostrate before Adam’; so they prostrated, except Iblīs, who was the father of the jinn — he used to keep company with the angels and worship God alongside them: he refused, to prostrate before Adam, he said: ‘I am better than him’ [Q. 7:12].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when We said unto the angels) Who were on the earth: (Fall prostrate before Adam) a prostration of greeting, (they fell prostrate (all) save Iblis) their chief; (he refused) he felt too proud to prostrate before 347 Adam.
